game.name: Baby Rapunzel and Belle cooking Pizza
game.description:
Baby Rapunzel and Belle Cooking Pizza is an awesome free online kitchen game for girls from different age groups. Start this brand new cooking game with going on grocery shopping first. During your visit to a nearest supermarket, take care of purchasing some ingredients that you will need to prepare the most delicious pizza. Also collect the useful toppings and try to keep patience while looking forward to achieve the goal of your game.  

Both baby Rapunzel and baby Belle are crazy for pizza, so they have decided to make it on their own. They have a complete recipe, however are seeing a bit of confused how to make the one themselves. Are you ready to help both the cuties to have their most favourite dish? Join them at the supermarket while they are searching for the useful ingredients to begin this cool kitchen game. Collect a bowl and mix some fresh eggs, salt, sugar, yeast and flour in it. 

Leave the dough in a warm and dry place to grow properly. Meanwhile, mix some dill, garlic, paprika and tomato sauce in another bowl. Then slice cheese, salami, chili peppers and tomatoes into several pieces. Take the dough then and start rolling it into a rounded shape. Use the spices tomato sauce on top of it and also add all the toppings to it. There is an oven to help get your pizza baked. Your favorite dish is ready to serve now. Enjoy a mouth-watering dinner with baby Rapunzel and baby Belle in this best fun cooking game for girls and boys!
